text:
Had a company reach out about a job but it was full-time and I’m not looking to switch jobs right now just contract work. It pays up to 50hr and great benefits some of what they are looking for HubSpot Certified Developer
• HubSpot Sales Hub, Marketing Hub Certificates
• Google Certificates
• Practical experience in an agency, a consulting company or in a comparable SaaS company
• Experience in migration and implementation of HubSpot
• Experience working in a Scrum team
• Project management experience with tools such as jira, asana, trello, teams or similar
• Experience with data analytics tools.
Fully remote is fine and no us requirement. They are out of Zurich. If you think this sounds like you and your interested DM me and I will get you in touch with them.

hey all!
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Looking-for-Landing-Page-Developer/m-p/578530#M27459|this post> came in on the Community Forums.  Any developer looking for a gig?
(don't reach out to me!  Please reply on the post :wink: )
